ZOA Robotics | London, UK | Full Time | Onsite

Startup developing highly mobile legged robots.

We engineer robots in a new way - dynamic by design, lightweight, safe.

Elegantly simple hardware backed by robust software. Our goal are robots with the grace of animals working with people.

We are looking for experienced hardware (electrical/mechanical) and software (machine learning/control) engineers.

We are at an early stage, stealthy, and looking for talented people who can hit the ground running and grow with us.

Salary + significant equity.

Details & contact: http://www.zoarobotics.com/jobs
